title: Post unassigned Zendesk tickets to Slack
author: Jonathan Bennetts
readme:
> This has been updated to support the Query feature added to the Zendesk node in [0.144.0](0.144)

This workflow will post all New and Open tickets without an agent assigned to a Slack channel on a schedule.

The function node is used in this example to merge multiple inputs into one output message which is then used as the Slack message.

The output in Slack will be similar to the below message, The "TICKET_ID" will be a link to the ticket.

> **Unassigned Tickets**  
>  TICKET_ID [STATUS] - TICKET_SUBJECT

**Usage**  
Update the Cron schedule, The default value is 16:30 daily.  
Update the Credentials in the Zendesk nodes  
Update the Credentials and Channel in the Slack Node  
Grab a coffee and enjoy!

**Zendesk Query**  
In the Zendesk node we are using the query `assignee:none status<pending` this returns all New and Open tickets with no assignee allowing us to remove the extra nodes.
readme_zh:
> 此流程已更新，以支持在[0.144.0](0.144)版本中为Zendesk节点新增的查询功能。

该工作流会按计划将所有未分配代理的新建(New)和开启(Open)状态工单发布到Slack频道。

本示例中使用函数节点将多个输入合并为一条输出消息，作为Slack消息发送。

Slack中的输出将类似以下消息，"工单ID"会附带跳转到对应工单的链接：

> **未分配工单**  
>  工单ID [状态] - 工单主题

**使用说明**  
1. 修改Cron定时设置（默认值为每日16:30）  
2. 更新Zendesk节点中的凭证信息  
3. 更新Slack节点中的凭证和频道设置  
4. 泡杯咖啡，轻松享受自动化服务！

**Zendesk查询语句**  
在Zendesk节点中使用的查询语句为`assignee:none status<pending`，该语句会返回所有未分配且状态为"新建"或"开启"的工单，从而帮助我们精简了额外节点。
